name: King Blob's Attack!
description:
Ever wondered what happened to King Blob? Well now you can...

This fast paced bullet hell shooter puts you in the dungeon of King Blob, killing his minions with the Automatic Rotating shooter belt 3000!

This bullet hell shooter has a unique mechanic. your aim object automatically goes around your player, so you need to time your shots right.

Everything made by me - This game was made for a University Assignment
